typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	container as string ('movies')
}
source(output(
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as timestamp,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as short,
		runtime as short,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		tier as short,
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true) ~> Movies
